name: Win Condition
_source: speak;Simon;Thanks for lending us a hand back there.
speak;Titus;The name's Titus, by the way.{w}{br}I'm a member of the Wandering Knights.{w}{br}We've set out to stop the miasma plaguing these lands.
speak;Simon;Coincidentally, we're here for a similar reason.{w}{br}Think your troops would be willing to lend us a hand?
speak;Titus;We'd certainly help.{w}{br}Can't promise too much, though.
speak;Titus;Seems the Fates have it in for us.{w} Our convoy has been ravaged by bandits,{w}{br}and many of our soldiers have disappeared in the night.{w}{br}Only a few paladins and I remain.
speak;Titus;This place is cursed, it seems.{w}{br}Between the miasma and the monsters, we've had some foul luck.
speak;Titus;Anyways, our camp is just up ahead, just outside the mausoleum.{w}{br}We'll muster the warmest welcome we can with our remaining rations.
